front.title: Using JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) Web Encryption (JWE) for Protecting JSON Web Key (JWK) Objects

abstract.t: This document specifies an approach to protecting a private key formatted as a JavaScript Syntax Object Notation (JSON) Web Key (JWK) object using JSON Web Encryption (JWE). This document also specifies a set of algorithms for protecting such content using password-based cryptography.
